vectorad-skin-desc: Modern version of MonoBook with fresh look and many usability improvements
prefs-vectorad-enable-vectorad-1-help: Over the next few years, we will be gradually updating the VectorAd skin. Legacy VectorAd will allow you to view the old version of VectorAd (as of December 2019). To learn more about the updates, go to our [[mw:Reading/Web/Desktop_Improvements|project page]].
vectorad-opt-out-tooltip: Change your settings to go back to the old look of the skin (legacy VectorAd)
vectorad.css: /* All CSS here will be loaded for users of the VectorAd skin */
vectorad.js: /* All JavaScript here will be loaded for users of the VectorAd skin */
